title: Oxygen consumption, body mass; 5 answer options 2

content.prompt: The best explanation for the fact that not all points lie on any given line is that

choices.label: the scale used to weigh the fish registered 0.001 kg too little
the fish grew during the course of the experiment
errors were made in plotting the data

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
